system.description:
A magical saw-blade of adamantine, 12’ long and 1’ wide, with the power to saw through trunks at a fantastic speed.

  • Minimum STR: A character of STR 18 can operate the saw alone. Two characters of STR 17 can operate it together.

  • Cutting speed: The saw can cut through a 4’ thick trunk in 3 turns, a 2’ trunk in 1 turn, and a 1’ trunk in 3 rounds.

  • Resting: After 6 turns of sawing, a character must rest for 6 turns.
